item.description:
DVD 1 of a set of 3 will be shown, as part our continuing discussion on the cause of upcoming 2012 changes... which we must prepare for now.... by learning how to shield energetically against devistating DNA mutations which will otherwise result.

The set of DVD's comes in a case which has the same photo as the cover of the book described on the link below, which is by the same author:

http://www.azuritepress.com/products_us/ar_b.php

Those who order the book will find this very useful also. 

But the DVD's are definately a "MUST SEE" for those who have been curious to know about angels and other types of phenomena which (before this) have remained shrouded in mystery.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign at end of first driveway and on front door. No need to knock. Meeting is in downstairs classroom.
item.name: Multi-Dimensional DNA Encoding, Indigoes, Angelic Realities, and ET Visitors
